title: Let's draw with crayons
brief_description: Elementary school children demonstrate several methods of using crayons artistically. Various techniques of application, shading, blending and using crayons are illustrated. Methods of creating designs for arts and crafts, textiles and posters are included. Good and bad drawing techniques are compared and hints made on the care of crayons.
